channel.title: Trees on Kyle Harris

item.title: Fitting Tree Models
item.description: read_csv() will allow us to read in the data from the site, however, we know the data has no column names. Thus, we shall read in the column names first. The data from names_url is not in a format for easy R interpritation. After some exploration on the website it looks like a .txt file, so we can use readlines to look at the data and find what we are looking for.
